events.message: I received the wrong item in my order, and I want to return it for a full refund as soon as possible.
The case was reviewed and categorized under the refund cluster due to the customer's request for a return and money back.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah T. for handling the refund request for the incorrect item received by the customer.
Hello! I’m Sarah, I’ll assist you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, I need to confirm the order number and details about the item you received by mistake.
The order number is 789654123. I actually received a blue jacket instead of the red one I ordered, please advise on the return process.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid return label immediately, and once we receive the incorrect item, we will process your refund within 3-5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you. I appreciate how quickly you are handling this issue.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount reflected in your account within 3 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Since the refund was processed and confirmed, we are now closing this case. Please contact us anytime if you have further questions or issues.
